context_bundle.summary: Distributed locking ensures mutual exclusion across nodes: Use Redis Redlock, etcd lease, or ZooKeeper locks. Set TTL to prevent deadlocks. Use fencing tokens to prevent split-brain. Pattern: Acquire lock → Do work → Release lock. Handle lock expiration mid-operation.

onboarding.quick_start: Distributed locking ensures mutual exclusion across nodes: Use Redis Redlock, etcd lease, or ZooKeeper locks. Set TTL to prevent deadlocks. Use fencing tokens to prevent split-brain. Pattern: Acquire lock → Do work → Release lock. Handle lock expiration mid-operation.
